!Warehouse Keeper Holvas: Is that so? Well, if Poitan saw fit to tell you, then I guess I can tell you as well. There are many people who are curious about you, you know... That's why I think I can sell this manuscript for a handsome price! I was able to procure the manuscript secretly, and I intended to have if brought here. But during the journey, raiders attacked my messenger at the *Execution Grounds*. He cannot be found -- and neither can the manuscript. Would you be willing to find the pieces of the manuscript? If you gather all the pieces and bring them to me, I will bind a book for you free of charge. [Quest _066_CertifiedArbalester 30058-04.htm|"Agree."]
